TEXT.English: [TAB]The Batavians were master horsemen. Their troops furnished great numbers of horsemen to the Roman Empire and graves of Batavian soldiers have been found in Brittan and Romania with their horses.[NEWLINE][TAB]One of the many skills the Batavian horsemen were said to have had is the ability to make their horses swim across rivers with full battle armor on all the while in perfect formation. To do this their horses must have been trained from the time they were foals to adulthood.
